evs.gui.utilities
Class ScaleTableRenderer

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JLabel
                  javax.swing.table.DefaultTableCellRenderer
                      evs.gui.utilities.ScaleTableRenderer
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.SwingConstants, javax.swing.table.TableCellRenderer
public class ScaleTableRenderer
extends javax.swing.table.DefaultTableCellRenderer

Extends the default table cell renderer to allow custom editing of table cell colors for the scale table.

Version:
4.0
Author:
evs@hydrosolved.com
See Also:
Serialized Form
